WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed - because I am tired of repeating myself to the stupid people out there that think 2.3.5 (and higher is broken), when in fact the calculations are 100% correct for the very first time. Simply install the DrDamage addon and you will see that the ingame results matches 2.3.5 (and higher), while 2.3.4 is completely and utterly broken. All that is missing is the pets, and certain buff mechanics - thats why the damage result is lower - but the actual rating of gear is now more correct than it ever was in 2.3.4.You only think that 2.3.4 is 'working' because it has pets (and a working 'events' tab, but the rest of 2.3.4 is so wrong that if you're using it for your loot decisions, well then you only have yourself to blame for your crap ingame dps.
WorkItem.Description: dps dropped from 6-7k to 2-3k.  Issues with gear suggestion upgrades as well, and and and....

Comments.Message:
In my version both based on the SVN and the 2.3.5 build the DPS is looking as if it is BASE only with no additions for events.  I am also noticing that PET DPS is zero as well.

Work in progress.

1) Pets are not added yet
2) The Events tab is blank because it is going to be replaced.

I'm sure it is well addressed already, but I also tried affliction/Demo/Destro spec, each of them show around 800-1500 DPS with 0 pet damage. And as Faidwen mentioned, events box is empty, no matter how you place your spell order. Many thanks for the work in progress in advanced, us locks are loving you for it.
The Warlock module is still completely useless in release 2.3.6.
Jaffse: Statements like that are utterly useless to anyone and are not welcome on our site.

Sorry about that. I was really frustrated with the model now that ICC gear is starting to pour into my backpack. I have no idea how you do your version control, but you should really think about proper versioning and only releasing models when they're actually working. I'd rather have a 90% working model than the one currently released.

Again, sorry if I came on too harsh.
Even if we followed your suggestion, you'd STILL be without a working lock model, and wouldn't have had anything at all for like 4 months
Version 2.3.5 ,2.3.6, 2.3.7, and 2.3.8 all broke on DPS calculations. I am still using 2.3.4 for a working model
